title: The_Way_of_the_Lord (2009) (Dragonz-Onairam-Choky-Tanim)cbr
description:
1066
England prepares to become the scene of one of fiercest and most epic battles of the midle ages.
Yet it is a completely different issue that will decide the fate of the british isles.
Covered in leather,is there a secret that could change the fate of Christendom?
Odo of bayeux,half-brother of duke Wiliam,was the first to discover how much the ways of the lord seem tortuous. 

A SERIES OF ONE SHOT STORIES.

THE HOLY LAND AS A BACKGROUND FOR THIS SECOND EPISODE OF THE HISTORICAL SAGA

Bernard, priest of Clairvaux and recognized theologist, sees in the map that he discovered the road Christ is said to take when he comes back to his kingdom on Earth: Jerusalem. A few pious knights are entrusted with taking the map to the Holy Land and watching over it. They will become the Miles ChristiÃ¢â‚¬Â¦
